item.title: Challenge 1-2: Marquee effect&Cube animation
item.description: In this challenge 1, the goal is make text infinite scrolling along the y axis. It might be usefull for intro or something. I’ve also add animating 3d looking cube for making it more interesting and this should be challenge 2. For these i’ve used “raylib” videogame library.
